title: Knife, ca. 1650–1700
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade straight-sided, the upper edge curving towards the point. Carved ivory handle, a man in Charles II period costume holding a walking stick in one hand and a pair of gloves in the other hand behind his back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1650–1700.
ca. 1650–1700. ivory, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-171.
